title: PSYC 301 Brain Dysfunction and Recovery
description: Cognitive and behavioral impairments resulting from brain dysfunction. Focus on the efficacy of various intervention approaches.
prerequisites: Either (a) PSYC 100 or (b) all of PSYC 101, PSYC 102. (Or 6 credits of 200-level PSYC (but not PSYC 205 or PSYC 263).)
